phrases: Do not tell me he actually...
Well, I sure got my hands on an awesome photo today!
I would better make sure Onodera does not see it, though.
So I still do not know which one's the girl I made that promise with.
But how am I supposed to figure it out?
Man, if only I had a photo of her, almost like this one.
I bet it would at least give me a hint.
Yeah, we should still have some.
Where the hell have they been all this time?!
I have turned this house upside-down numerous times looking for them, you know!
Oh, no wonder you could not find them.
They are all locked up in the storehouse.
You are talking about the photos from that trip we took ten years ago, right?
If I recall correctly, we did not have a lot of photos from those days,
but there should be just one left at the back of the storehouse.
Who knew a clue about the girl was so close this whole time?
But maybe now I can get a step closer to the truth.
I think you begged me to take that photo of you and that little girl with the key.
You mentioned something about an important promise you would made with her or something.
but I still could not find it.
Hey, you free after school today?
How about grabbing some burgers and studying before we head home today?
Why do you want to study all of a sudden?
Well, you know, finals are just around the corner!
I was just wondering if you had any strategies mapped out, Ichijou-kun.
Why are you acting so friendly?
Strategies are for people who do not prepare daily.
Sorry, but I study every night.
And besides, there is something really important I have to look for today.
Hey, Seishirou-chan, have you ever ordered a Smile?
No, cannot say that I have...
You were holding out on purpose!
That photo's not going anywhere anyway.
Going to Mickey D's with everyone after school...
Oh, wow, I have always dreamed of doing this!
But it was not too long ago that stopping by Mickey D's after school
That is the sound for when the fries are done!
with Onodera was just a pipe dream.
I might be on the verge of finding out
whether she is the girl I made the promise with.
Are not the fries here delish?!
Which one of them is it?
My memories are so fuzzy; I just cannot remember.
I cannot stop eating them once I start!
What color was her hair, anyway?
I wonder what size we should get?
Well, large, of course, do not you think?
If I start thinking too hard about it,
it starts to feel like it might have been a different color altogether.
No, let us go with four!
Thinking about it is not going to get me anywhere!
How do you guys want to sit?
Kosaki, why do not you sit next to Ichijou-kun?
That way he can help you out again like last time.
I think Ichijou-kun should sit next to Chitoge-chan, do not you?
I could have sworn that Onodera was acting more distant than usual just now.
I have got to get it together and study for now.
This makes it our second study group, huh?
Seishirou-chan, are you a good student?
Claude-sama told me to make sure that I can pass any college entrance exam with my eyes closed.
So that much, I can manage.
Classes in Japan are such a breeze, are not they?
You two sound like you live in a different dimension!
Do not tell me you cannot even solve an easy problem like that!
Do you still believe you are worthy of being Mistress's boyfriend despite that?
Well, since you are begging me...
First, in the case of this problem...
You take this, and do this, and...
She is being unusually nice to me today.
Were you even listening to me just now?
But I got to say, you are good at teaching, Tsugumi.
Then try the rest on your own.
Which part did she help you with?
Why do you have that smug look on your face!?
Looks like they are getting along just fine, huh?
Although studying for exams is important,
we also got some English homework today!
Not that there is anything to be afraid of, since we have Kirisaki-san!
You can speak English, right, Chitoge-chan?
Would you mind translating this English passage?
They are all counting on me!
I have no idea what you are talking about.
Oh, do not play dumb with me!
Then tell me, whose hair is this?
Who is more important to youme or that woman?
English Teacher Creator of the text
What kind of drama is this?
For some reason, Onodera has the same vibe as the girl from my memories.
I might be the boy from hers.
I do not care about you anymore, George!
No matter what, I just do not get the same feeling.
But she knows the phrase zawsze in love, and she has a key.
If I explain, you will see...
Thinking about it does not do me any good,
All right, I just need to settle down for now.
If I can just find that photo, everything will be clear as day.
So whoever turns out to be the girl...
Which one do you like better, Raku?
Well, of course that would be Onode
I asked you which flavor you liked better, chocolate or vanilla milkshakes?
Which do you like better, Onodera?
I like strawberry too, you know!
I was just about to publicly confess my feelings for her!
Putting my earlier thoughts in order,
Onodera has to be the girl.
I mean, Kirisaki's way different from the girl I have in mind.
Oh, no, you are wrong about that, George.
I am the person you are destined to be with!
Anyway, there is no sense thinking about it now.
If I can just find that photo, it will all be...
This must be the box the old man told me about.
Inside this box lies a photo from that day, ten years ago...
And once I see it, I will learn the identity of the girl I have been searching for all this time!
Which one did I make the promise with?!
I will soon find out once and for all, after I take a look.
It is neither Onodera nor Kirisaki!
I do not remember this girl at all!
What is that she is holding?
This girl is the one I made the promise with?
So who is this girl, anyway?
If you are looking for your dad, he just went out.
Come to think of it, the girl in the photo Raku was talking about...
Is not she the same kid?
Just when I thought I was about to learn who she was,
the mystery got even more baffling.
What the hell is going on here?
The photos from the field trip are ready!
Come pick them up in student-number order!
So it was not either Onodera or Kirisaki that I made the promise with?
But I do not remember that girl at all.
Then I wonder if those two...
But neither of them know that we met years ago.
Although I am sure I should tell them soon.
Hey, do not you have an umbrella?
There was a show I wanted to watch when I got home, too.
It is not far, so I will walk you home.
I would rather go home soaking wet than share an umbrella with you!
You are going to catch a cold, you know.
You are not getting wet, are you?
Those two are sharing an umbrella!
What the hell are you doing?
You are getting all wet, so what did you expect?!
She is been acting strange lately.
How am I supposed to handle this?
What is with that look on your face?
You would better not be thinking any filthy thoughts!
I am doing this for you to be nice!
I told you I was not!
Besides, I never asked you to do anything!
Do not be so cocky, you stupid bean sprout!
Who are you callin' a gorilla
That one was pretty close, was not it?
Who knew you were afraid of lightning too?
You have got a lot of vulnerabilities, you know that?
If you tell anybody, I will make you pay!
But we are going to have to take shelter for a while.
Then I will have to miss my show after all!
All right, how are we going to kill time?
Why do not you come up with some topic?
If you do not say anything, I will get scared again!
Okay, why do not we look at the photos from field trip that we got today?
I will have you know, I have got a really strong hand!
What is this, a card game?
Holy crap, that is a ton!
How many dozen did you buy?!
I thought this might happen, so I sorted out Onodera's photos in advance!
Though your face is still lame.
Where did that photo come from?
I swear, I have never seen that one!
So that is when he did it to me!
It is not what you think!
Just let me explain and you will see!
This is one of Shuu's pranks!
After all, you would not have the balls to carry around a photo like this.
Forget that, just look at this one!
This one where we are all together.
Then there is this one... and...
Well, for someone who kept a Friend Notebook until recently,
you have really fit in with everyone, huh?
Well, I have gone through a lot since moving here.
Of course I would grow as a person.
Ever since you showed up, it is been one thing after another.
Though my one regret is that I have to spend the precious days of my youth as your girlfriend.
I have been thinking that this fake love thing is not as bad as it seemed.
These days I have been feeling that way, too, a little...
Did you think I was serious?
You know that I would never say anything like that.
You need to dial down the teasing!
Well, well, look at you two.
Pretty steamy for the middle of the day, huh?
I know I asked you two to fake being lovers,
but do not tell me you are the real deal now!
Actually, I wanted to talk to you about something, so I was just looking for you.
There is something I wanted to ask you, too.
Mine's an emergency, so I am going first.
I really hate to do this to you two just when you have gotten so close.
But now there is a bit of a complication, see.
The thing is, all of a sudden, she is coming here to see you tomorrow.
I have been waiting for this day for the last ten years...
